section.title: Setting JAIN SLEE Source Code Projects in Eclipse IDE
section.para: The JAIN SLEE Core, each RA, and each example, are worked out with separated Eclipse IDE Projects.
There are two alternatives to set up a specific project:

step.para: In the checked out directory of the project, and with Eclipse IDE closed, open a terminal.
Install M2Eclipse if you want to do maven builds within Eclipse.
Install the M2Eclipse plugin and use "Import..." and subselect the "Maven Projects" feature.

important.para: Ensure the "Resolve Workspace projects" and "Separate projects for modules" in the "Advanced" options on the bottom of the window are turned off. If the project is large, such as the JAIN SLEE Core, M2Eclipse may be a considerable slower option, due to dynamic Maven2 Dependency Management.
